targets.rawSql:
WITH accounts AS (SELECT oid AS "account id", name AS "account" FROM entity WHERE type='BUSINESS_ACCOUNT'
     ), rgroups AS (SELECT DISTINCT "account id", "account", e.oid AS resource_group_id, e.name as "resource group name"
         FROM accounts, entity e,
         scope_to($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), 'RESOURCE_GROUP', ARRAY["account id"], false) AS s
         WHERE s.oid = e.oid
     ), entities AS (SELECT DISTINCT "account id", "account", resource_group_id, "resource group name", e.oid AS "entity id", e.name AS "entity name", e.type AS "entity type", e.attrs as tags
         FROM rgroups, entity e,
         scope_to_types($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), ARRAY['VIRTUAL_MACHINE','VIRTUAL_VOLUME', 'DATABASE', 'DATABASE_SERVER']::entity_type[], ARRAY[resource_group_id], false) AS s
         WHERE s.oid = e.oid
)

SELECT  "entity id", "entity name", "entity type", es.savings_type AS "savings type", sum(es.stats_value) AS "total savings/investment", "account", "resource group name",  tags
    FROM entity_savings es, entities
    WHERE es.entity_oid = entities."entity id"
    AND time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 ORDER BY 1;
